Class DoctorService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.adesso.termacare.service.DoctorService

  • public class DoctorService
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class for querying for/by doctors or modifying doctors

      • createOrUpdateDoctor

        public void createOrUpdateDoctor(long id,
                                 java.lang.String title,
                                 Gender gender,
                                 java.lang.String givenName,
                                 java.lang.String familyName)
        Save or update the data for a doctor If the given id is zero a new medication is created
        Parameters:
        id - id of the doctor to update or 0 to create new doctor
        title - title of the doctor
        gender - gender of the doctor
        givenName - givenName of the doctor
        familyName - familyName of the doctor

      • getMedications

        public java.util.List<Medication> getMedications(long doctorId)
        get all the medications the given doctor has to attend to.
        Parameters:
        doctorId - doctor to load medications for
        Returns:
        list of all medications of the doctor
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the doctor does not exist

      • getPatients

        get all the patients the given doctor is treating
        Parameters:
        doctorId - doctor to load patients for
        Returns:
        list of all the doctors patients
